data.message: Love it music grew up on you when my fam was beating me and starving me shotguns in mom's mouth was a weekend thing methadone and muscle relaxers everyday I heard your music the day I died in the chopper in a coma for 3 days everyone's got problems. But when ur fans try to shit on autism that's when I know your real and the majority is fake you have so many fans that don't deserve to hear your music if even live bitch ass fagotz wanna bes never gunna bes fuck you,your mentality and I hope your kids don't live because of the influence that you give I'm not no eminem but I can see why living the dream is enough to put a bullet in your brim
